DOC.criteria: All subject Body weight ) : ≥40.0 kg < 90.0 kg Body mass index BMI : ≥17.6 < 30.0 Female subject must either : Be postmenopausal surgically sterile . Patients mild impaired renal function ( eGFR ; ≥60 mL/min/1.73 m2 < 90 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Patients moderate impaired renal function ( eGFR ; ≥30 mL/min/1.73 m2 < 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Patients severe impaired renal function ( eGFR ; ≥15 mL/min/1.73 m2 < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Patients whose treatment regimen ( include diet ) renal impairment complication remain unchanged within 14 day prior hospital admission day ( Day 1 ) , patient receive treatment ( include diet ) need change period 14 day hospital admission day ( Day 1 ) followup examination opinion investigator subinvestigator .
